title: freezing loading mode
body:
my screen suddenly get stuck and freezing on Loading mode before game has start , so i had to restart my Pc to get back into the game , but the game was remked and i got 5 game banned for 20 minutes.. 
the Freezing mode happend to me many times.. 
im not a leaver at all , i want to consider this please , and take that 20 minutes away , 5 game i have to wait about 20 minutes..

replies.body: Try updating your firewall exceptions using [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) for me really quickly. It's not uncommon for firewalls or antivirus to get a little overzealous and block those communications, but definitely let me know if it doesn't help!
